Name: Freedom Drive
About the game: Defeat the Boss of each location. Survive the Onslaught of deadly vehicles, environments. Unlock new, faster, stronger or stranger vehicles to aid you in your mission for Freedom. Build your strength to take on stronger challengers! Upgrades Heaps of Weapons to customize your play style. You can rely on heavy flamers to melt away problems. Or flying Saw Blades that travel a great distance and hit multiple enemies at once! Vehicles There is a Vehicle for every play style. From Speed Demons, to slow lumbering impenetrable Goliaths. Each player Vehicle comes with its own Main Weapon and upgrades to really diversify the playing field. Maps 3 Biomes each with 3 maps full of new enemies in each to challenge you and your Freedom. Each map is home to a unique boss and environmental hazards for you to learn and take advantage of. Or die trying. -Early Access- Find out everything you need to know on the discord More information about the early access will become available closer to Early Access Release
